name: Execute Sub-workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Execute Sub-workflow 节点。主要用于: Execute another workflow

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: call_workflow

outdatedVersionWarning.displayName: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one
outdatedVersionWarning.name: outdatedVersionWarning
outdatedVersionWarning.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one

source.name: source
source.description: Where to get the workflow to execute from
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Where to get the workflow to execute from | 默认值: database
available_options: Database (值: database) - Load the workflow from the database by ID
Define Below (值: parameter) - Pass the JSON code of a workflow

workflowPath.name: workflowPath
workflowPath.description: The path to local JSON workflow file to execute
workflowPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow Path | 作用: The path to local JSON workflow file to execute | (必填项)

workflowJson.name: workflowJson
workflowJson.description: The workflow JSON code to execute
workflowJson.natural_language_description:
参数名: Workflow JSON | 作用: The workflow JSON code to execute | 默认值: 


 | (必填项)

workflowUrl.name: workflowUrl
workflowUrl.description: The URL from which to load the workflow from
workflowUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow URL | 作用: The URL from which to load the workflow from | (必填项)

executeWorkflowNotice.displayName: Any data you pass into this node will be output by the Execute Workflow Trigger. More info
executeWorkflowNotice.name: executeWorkflowNotice
executeWorkflowNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Any data you pass into this node will be output by the Execute Workflow Trigger. More info

workflowInputs.name: workflowInputs
workflowInputs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow Inputs | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: once
available_options: Run once with all items (值: once) - Pass all items into a single execution of the sub-workflow
Run once for each item (值: each) - Call the sub-workflow individually for each item

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: waitForSubWorkflow (值: None) - Whether the main workflow should wait for the sub-workflow to complete its execution before proceeding
